Package com.itkolleg.bookingsystem.controller

Class GlobalExceptionController

java.lang.Object
com.itkolleg.bookingsystem.controller.GlobalExceptionController
@ControllerAdvice public class GlobalExceptionController extends Object
This class handles global exceptions for the booking system.
Since:
2023-05-24
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sonja Lechner, Marcel Schranz
